April 2014 to Present

Design Lead at Angie’s List (Acquired by Home Advisor)

May 2010 to April 2014

Launched and lead design for SnapFix by Angie’s List, a strategic, standalone iPhone app that allows any consumer to snap a photo and get a quote from a top-rated service provider on Angie’s List without needing an Angie’s List subscription. SnapFix incorporated into the core Angie’s List app and pushed the business to change its model and offer free subscription plans.

Launched and lead design for The Big Deal, a daily deal site offering up to 70% off home services from top-rated service providers on Angie’s List. The program started in one city and scaled its offering to every major city in the US with expanded support from product and sales teams. The Big Deal incorporated into the core Angie’s List experience and today, any service provider can offer daily deals.

Lead design for the core Angie’s List mobile app.

Web Designer at Salesvue

June 2007 to May 2010
